title: Data Warehousing
ziele: Students are enabled to apply methods and tools for integrating large amounts of data - particularly business and web data - to an Enterprise Data Warehouse, and to analyze this data. They know the reference architecture of data warehousing systems, and OLAP languages. The students are able to plan, design and implement data warehouses.
lehrinhalte: Reference architecture of data warehousing systems; multidimensional data model; conceptual, logical and physical design process of data warehouses; data extraction, cleaning and storage techniques; OLAP languages and tools; security aspects; distributed data warehousing; case studies and practical scenarios, with a particular focus on Web warehousing.
beurteilung:
<sup><acronym title='Unfortunately this information is not available in english.'>(*)</acronym></sup>Vorlesung: Klausur 
Übung: Ausarbeitung, Präsentation und Diskussion von Fallbeispielen und Spezialthemen
sonstiges: <sup><acronym title='Unfortunately this information is not available in english.'>(*)</acronym></sup>Vorlesung und Übung können auch als Kombinierte Lehrveranstaltung angeboten werden.
